items.value: %113% has discovered that a [Human/Elf/Goblin] named [Character Name] is preparing to explore [Location Name] soon. It might be a while before [he/she] returns.

%113% took the guise of a wandering merchant and started a conversation with [Character Name]. He managed to dissuade [Character Name] from leaving by telling tales of fearsome beasts roaming outside.

%113% took the guise of a wandering merchant and started a conversation with [Character Name]. He attempted to dissuade [Character Name] from leaving by telling tales of fearsome beasts roaming outside but [Character Name] instead appeared to be more excited by the stories. It looks like we can no longer stop him from moving.

%113% took the guise of a wandering merchant and started a conversation with [Character Name]. He started spinning wondrous tales about [Location Intel] to [Character Name]. Convinced, [Character Name] has now decided to go there instead. What do you want [Demon Name] to do next?
%113% will not interfere with the character.
%113% convinced [Character Name] to stay in [Location Name].
%113% convinced [Character Name] to stay in [Location Name].
%113% failed to stop [Character Name] from leaving to [Location Name].
%113% failed to stop [Character Name] from leaving to [Location Name].
%113% convinced [Character Name] to go to [Location Name].
%113% convinced [Character Name] to go to [Location Name].
